name: Robot Chase
description: Robot Chase is a runner game about robot that has abandoned all vain attempts to correct the work of the factory and is forced to flee from the eraser laser, skipping various traps and obstacles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: DualCore Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128mb Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 50 MB available space
